verses.name: Matthew 7:17
verses.text: Even so every good tree bringeth forth good fruit; but a corrupt tree bringeth forth evil fruit.

verses.name: Matthew 7:18
verses.text: A good tree cannot bring forth evil fruit, neither can a corrupt tree bring forth good fruit.

verses.name: Matthew 7:19
verses.text: Every tree that bringeth not forth good fruit is hewn down, and cast into the fire.

verses.name: Matthew 7:20
verses.text: Wherefore by their fruits ye shall know them.

verses.name: Matthew 7:21
verses.text: Not every one that saith unto me, Lord, Lord, shall enter into the kingdom of heaven; but he that doeth the will of my Father which is in heaven.
